question: (Sarah of the Clue Crew delivers the clue from Nellis Air Force Base in Las Vegas, Nevada.)  Used regularly in Iraq, this aircraft with an aggressive name is designated MQ-1; the 1 means it's the first of its kind, a long-range, unmanned, recon aircraft
